trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Sault Ste. Marie
There were no other sightings in Sault Ste. Marie on or around September 15th 2012
Summary: very bright orange-red color came from northeast then turned north, returned a second time on same course. lights went out after turning north both times.
divs: Sighting DetailsStargazing on Sept. 15th. saw bright three orange-red lights coming from the nottheast at a shallow angle. Appeared to be over St. Mary's river.Turned northward then bright lights went out but returned again using same path. Absolutly silent. Bright lights also went out as it headed north a second time.Lights were brighter than normal landing lights on a commercial aircraft.
